spanishExample: ¡Créeme! Siempre deja sus cosas por todas partes.
englishTranslation: Believe me! She always leaves her things everywhere.
Leave me! I just want them to believe me.

spanishExample: ¡Espera! Hay quienes quieren jugar juegos de mesa.
englishTranslation: Wait! There are those who want to play board games.

spanishExample: ¡Tienes que creer en algo, así que deja eso atrás!
englishTranslation: You have to believe in something, so leave that behind!
Do you think she was talking about that?

spanishExample: ¿Qué hay de la seguridad? Creí que era seguro.
englishTranslation: What about security? I thought it was safe.

spanishExample: Cree lo mismo que yo creía.
englishTranslation: She believes the same thing I used to believe.

spanishExample: Creías que el lugar era seguro.
englishTranslation: You thought the place was safe.

spanishExample: Creo que deberíamos hablar bajo tan pronto como ella esté aquí.
englishTranslation: I think we should talk quietly as soon as she is here.

spanishExample: Creyó que el juego era bastante rápido esa vez.
englishTranslation: She believed the game was quite fast that time.

spanishExample: Ella creía que esta no era la realidad.
englishTranslation: She believed this wasn’t the reality.

spanishExample: Ella espera que lo podamos hacer medio bien.
englishTranslation: She hopes we can do it kind of well.

spanishExample: Espero que creas en algo, así que ¡cree en ti mismo!
englishTranslation: I hope you believe in something, so believe in yourself!

spanishExample: Espero que ella no crea lo que dijeron sobre mí.
englishTranslation: I hope she doesn’t believe what they said about me.

spanishExample: Me lo dirá cuando le crea.
englishTranslation: She’ll tell me it when I believe her.

spanishExample: No creas que esto no es peor.
englishTranslation: Don’t believe that this isn’t worse.

spanishExample: No ha creído en nada en años.
englishTranslation: She hasn’t believed in anything in years.

spanishExample: No vas a creerlo, pero creemos que puede ser verdad.
englishTranslation: You aren’t going to believe it, but we think it might be true.
